name: You Only Live Twice (Team Zero Fantasy)
name_original: You Only Live Twice (Team Zero Fantasy)
description:
Created by Team Zero Fantasy (#14) for Buddy Up Jam 2021.

A light-hearted point-and-click adventure about starting a new life after death!

Controls

  • Left-click with the mouse to move to different locations.
  • Hover the mouse over interactable objects to see a brief description.
  • Left-click interactable objects to pick them up or perform a default action.
  • Hover the mouse near the top of the screen to bring up the inventory.
  • Click the gear icon in the inventory or press the escape key to bring up the pause menu.
  • Left-click on inventory items to select them for use.
  • Right-click to de-select the current inventory item.
  • Left-click on interactable objects with an inventory item to use that item on them.
  • Left-click on an inventory item with another inventory to try and combine them.
